```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
library(broom)
library(dlnm)
library(stats)
library(knitr)
library(scales)
library(lubridate)
```

##Input dataset
```{r input data}
library(readr)
homicide_data <- read_csv("data/homicide-data.csv")
```

```{r city_state}
#new column combining state and city; filter to baltimore
baltimore <- homicide_data %>%
  mutate(city_name = str_c(city, state, sep = ",")) %>%
  filter(city_name == "Baltimore,MD")
```

##Baltimore data
```{r baltimore}
baltimore1 <- baltimore %>%
  mutate(Date = ymd(reported_date))
```

##Homicides per month
```{r per month}
per_month <- baltimore1 %>%
  group_by(year(Date), month(Date)) %>%
  summarize(Per_Month = n())
```
